name: Roots (IsaVII)
description:
A Game for  the GGJ 2023. Theme: Roots
My personal goal was to just create a small base game for adding mini games to it.
In my main project I will need mini games, so I want to test them in a separate project which will be this one.

The game contains 3 different puzzle games with 4 difficulty-levels.
For each game and for each difficulty can you get a score. The sum of all scores can be one of the global plasterboard's scores.


Sound is from a sound-asset-bundle.
The pictures in the game that are not vector-art are from https://openai.com/api/
